treasure.name: wand
treasure.description: Your trusty magic wand that has protected you through many a journey against magical foes.

treasure.name: sword
treasure.description: Your trusty sword that has cleaved through many a beast that would have seen you as dinner.

treasure.name: automaticCrossbow
treasure.description: A crossbow which continuously fires bolts so long as the trigger is held.

treasure.name: romanCandle
treasure.description: A wand-like object that emits a ball of greek fire when evoked.

treasure.name: phoenixBearMace
treasure.description: An aluminum cylinder covered in warning labels. A firey blue growling bear face is plastard on the front. 'Keep Away from Eyes'

treasure.name: bananaPeel
treasure.description: The peel of a banana, its insides seem unusually slippery.

treasure.name: handheldVacuumCleaner
treasure.description: Small but powerful little vacuum that runs on batteries.

treasure.name: banefulButterknife
treasure.description: A tiny blade that glints wickedly in the light.  Sharp enough to cut through anything like butter.  Watch your fingers!

treasure.name: cattleProd
treasure.description: A thin black cylinder with two metal prongs sticking out of one end. Perfect for dealing with shapeshifters and mimics.

treasure.name: readME
treasure.description: A document containing the wisdom of the ages as they pertain to version control with git.

treasure.name: heathPotion
treasure.description: A marvel of medical science, this potion will heal 2 points of your vaguely defined injuries.

treasure.name: lesserheathPotion
treasure.description: A marvel of medical science, this potion will heal 1 point of your vaguely defined injuries.

treasure.name: greaterheathPotion
treasure.description: A marvel of medical science, this potion will heal 3 points of your vaguely defined injuries.
